replies.body:
Skybases are pretty easy to take down if you think about it. If they know you aren't there, you can easily take them out by shifting and pillaring. Bringing the tool required to break the blocks underneath is preferable to have rather than coming up from the side.

Another option is that you can burn them if they built with wood.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
lol, I had an epic skybase earlier tonight in a game after the one with JJ above. 

But as much fun as I have with them, I agree that a height limit of 256 is pretty crazy.  Normal ground level is 75, I would suggest a height limit of 150.

Also, flint & steel doesn't work right in Walls, can't set trees / bases on fire.
replies.body_tagged:
